components.name: Door Assembly
components.function: Encloses passenger compartment and provides access to vehicle

components.name: Fender (Wheelhouse)
components.function: Covers wheels and suspension components, protects from road debris

components.name: Bumper
components.function: Absorbs impact energy during collisions, protects front and rear ends

components.name: Hood (Bonnet)
components.function: Covers engine compartment, provides access to engine for maintenance
